ovdesc.p: This file is a concat file to the MI.STAT file.

When records on this file exceed two hundred lines (ie more than two hundred MI.STAT records were produced when the build process was run) a new record is created, and a sequence number is incremented.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
The key to the MI.STAT.XREF records. The key is composed of three parts, separated by the '*' character.
a) The MI.STAT.DEFINITION record which defines the process which created MI.STAT records.
b) The date on which this process was run (the DATE.RUN field on MI.STAT)
c) The sequence number, beginning at 0.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
